title: FS: T 205's Otis Crandall(with Crossed T),McGraw, "One Ear" Wiltse
author: JJ McGraw

posts.post_title: FS: T 205's Otis Crandall(with Crossed T),McGraw, "One Ear" Wiltse
posts.post_content:
Hi All.......here are three T 205's of some hard to get cards. The shape is not perfect, but they are priced to fill that slot in your T 205 collection that is hard to fill. The pictures speak to the condition.

1, Otis Crandall WITH the crossed T AND Polar Bear Back.....$900.00PRICE REDUCED  $400.00
2, John J. McGraw HOF Idoes have paper loss on back)........$224.99PRICE REDUCED   $99.99
3. George "Hooks" Wiltse (Only Right Ear Shown)................$200.00PRICE REDUCED   $59.99

I prefer Paypal as payment method. Reasonable offers will be considered.
You can contact me here or thru email: [url]mboyd05@attglobal.net[/url]

Thanks for looking, Mike
Hi All........I have reduced the price on each card...Thanks for looking, Mike

If anyone is interested in a trade deal on the Wiltse and McGraw for T206's I might not have(commons) I'm interested. Some creasing on them is OK with me as I'm closing in on the 80% done mark, so it is a question of getting what I need to fill the spots. Thanks, Mike/SIZE]
